body.name: OUAI Medium Conditioner - Hydrating Hair Conditioner with Coconut Oil, Babassu Oil, and Keratin - Strengthens, Repairs and Adds Shine - Paraben and Phthalate Free Hair Care Products - 10 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 4 mins
features: Conditioner for Hair Repair -Stuck in the middle? Wash your OUAI to a happy medium with this nourishing conditioner makes your medium hair type easier to manage. Nourishing ingredients help strengthen, smooth, hydrate and repair damaged strands.

Hydrating That's Justtt Right - Made with Babassu oil that adds weightless hydration to dry hair and scalp and Coconut oil to strengthen strands by sealing split ends to reduce breakage. Hydrolyzed keratin tames frizzy hair and controls flyaways while Kumquat fruit extract leaves hair with a shiny finish.

OUAI Means Yes - In that casual Parisian way. OUAI is about being better IRL. It's about having honest conversations with our community. It's about letting go of unrealistic expectations and embracing your imperfections.

Made For Effortless Routines - All OUAI hair care products including this moisturizing conditioner are carefully crafted to cut styling time and nourish your hair health. We put the good stuff in and leave the bad stuff out, without ever sacrificing quality.

Live Life Your OUAI - OUAI offers luxury hair products at affordable prices that are user-friendly — no glam squad needed. Apply this keratin conditioner on wet hair from midshaft to ends and comb through with fingers, then rinse clean. Pair with OUAI Medium Shampoo for the hair you deserve.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great on fine hair and also smell great
reviews.reviewText: I'm hair feels so smooth and combs out with no tangles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It makes my hair very soft without being weighed down. Doesn’t make my hair oily at all. It smells like roses. The smell is a bit strong for me, but I’m able to tolerate it. I’m just sensitive to smells due to MCAS, so I don’t think I’d buy again only because of the strong smell. But this is a quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a very deep conditioner so I only put it on the ends of my hair once a week. Has a very soft, warm, pleasant scent. A little goes a long way so even though it’s a little pricey it lasts a long time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great conditioner, but strong smell
reviews.reviewText: I love that this product made my hair incredibly shiny and smooth. My only complaint is that it has a ton of fragrance. When I put it on my hair, the perfumey smell was almost overwhelming. This conditioner worked wonders for my hair, but I would not recommend it for anyone sensitive to smells.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars but now only use the quai products
reviews.reviewText: Love this shampoo and conditioner. It’s is my favorite now. I used to only use purology but now only use quai products. I love the smell and the way it makes my hair feel. No more frizz when using the oil as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pricey but worth it!
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite conditioner ever. The smell is heavenly! It works really well too and I prefer it to Olaplex. Definitely try if you’re thinking about it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your hair will smell amazing for DAYS!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have very fine hair and was in the market for a shampoo and conditioner that didn't weigh my hair down. This stuff is amazing for my fine hair and it leaves behind a luxurious scent that has lasted days in my hair. I am someone who cannot stand smelling bad and now I never have to worry about my hair getting that " dirty hair smell" a day or two after washing. I have also been able to stretch out my hair wash days to just twice a week (for someone with fine, thin, oily hair, this is a huge step). The only caveat I have with this product is that the conditioner is not super moisturizing. It makes my hair a little soft if I leave it on for a few minutes. This is the downside of using products formulated for thin hair. We need the volume and added moisture tends to weigh our hair down. However, I have started using a weekly hair mask that has combatted this problem.Overall, I have never used a shampoo or conditioner that has had such a powerful lasting scent on my hair like this one. I catch myself smelling my hair throughout the day because it is so addicting!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First of all, I bought this product specifically because it stated it was for fine hair. The packaging is pretty, the conditioner was a good consistency (will update once I’ve used the product more than once). The reason for my 3 stars is the scent. Dang…. Pow! Bing! Bam! That’s a strong, granny, powdery, floral scented soap smell. Wow!…. Just wow…. Whoever decided to go with this fragrance should rethink what they do for a living. I think if it wasn’t so strong I might’ve tolerated it. Maybe if I see great results I will change my star rating, but tbh I won’t be buying this product again once it’s finished because I cannot stand this smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Paired this with the detox shampoo, have to say it’s made my hair feel so fresh and softer, I think people are over reacting about the smell as it’s not even terrible at all, 100% worth the money you can see the difference between this conditioner compared to a cheap one on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good product giving required finish after use. Would purchase again and give as present

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Great product shame about the bottle design!
reviews.reviewText: Can’t deny the great product quality and my hair feels amazing after using this conditioner for thick hair - no more frizz! However the bottle design is awful as you need to be super strong to squeeze the product through the ridiculously tiny hole! I end up unscrewing the top just to be able to dispense enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ever had that feeling of walking into the perfume section of a giant shopping mall, only to be hit with a pungent mix of 1000 perfume smells at the same time?That's what this conditioner smells like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wish I’d read the reviews. The smell is awful and is hard to wash out! I found it hard on my hair, dried it out. Overpriced poor quality product.
